Submodules¶

kep.commands module¶

Manage dataset by year and month:

download(year, month) unpack(year, month) convert(year, month) save_processed(year, month) to_latest(year, month) to_excel(year, month)

kep.commands.download(year, month)¶
kep.commands.unpack(year, month)¶
kep.commands.convert(year, month)¶
kep.commands.save_processed(year, month)¶
kep.commands.to_latest(year, month)¶
kep.commands.to_excel(year, month)¶

kep.runner module¶

Access interim CSV file by year and month, parse values, validate and create pandas dataframes by frequency.

kep.runner.get_dataframes(year, month)¶

Return a tuple of annual, quarterly and monthly dataframes by year and month. Prints parsing synopsis to stdout.

kep.runner.get_dataframe_dict(year, month)¶

Return a dictionary with annual, quarterly and monthly dataframes by year and month.

kep.get_dataframes(year, month)¶

Return a tuple of annual, quarterly and monthly dataframes by year and month. Prints parsing synopsis to stdout.
